Bakersfield.Bak-Anime:
Bak-Anime is an annual two-day anime convention held at the Kern County Fairgrounds in Bakersfield, California by the staff of Sac-Anime. The convention is the sister conventions to the Bakersfield Comic Con, Sacramento Comic, Toy and Anime Show (Sac-Con), and Sac-Anime.


== Programming ==
The convention typically offers artists, card game tournaments, cosplay contest, a swap meet, and vendors.
